titleStmt.title: Israels call to march out of Babylon unto Jerusalem: opened in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament, Novemb. 26, 1645, being the day of publique humiliation. / By John Durye, a member of the Assembly of Divines. Published by order of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Tho. Vnderhill, at the signe of the Bible in Wood-street.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Wood-street.
